com.storytron.swat.util

Class MenuTooltipManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • com.storytron.swat.util.MenuTooltipManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.AWTEventListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener

    public final class MenuTooltipManager
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
implements java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.AWTEventListener
    Custom implementation for showing tooltips.

    It prevents the default tooltip position from overlapping the component, but the component can override that if it provides a positions that fits completely in the screen via JComponent.getToolTipLocation(MouseEvent).
